name: Find Food or Die
description:
Find Food or Die is a simple roguelike survival game. Your goal is to survive as many days as possible.     

    -Every move costs 1 food point.
    -Enemies can subtract 10 or 20 food points if they attack you.
    -You can gain food points by finding food.
    -Every level is randomly generated.
    -Amount of enemies increases as you progress.
